message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $7500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $8500.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I still believe there's room for negotiation. I am willing to pay $8000 for the product.
I understand that you're trying to find a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $8000. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $9200.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $8800 for the product.
I'm still not willing to sell the product for $8800, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $9400.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I am willing to pay $8900 for the product.
I'm still not willing to sell the product for $8900, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9600.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers, but I am unable to increase my offer. I am willing to pay $8800 for the product.
